item.title: 213 East Dulwich Grove regularly blocking pavement, 8th October
item.description:
Usually early morning 7.30-8am but throughout the day. Dangerous for children going to school. I had to take my son into the road to get past it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): East Dulwich Grove, Dulwich Village, London

item.title: Barriers and signage left after manhole repair., 8th October
item.description:
After the repair of a collapsed manhole the barriers and road signs have been left abandoned against the fence of number 131 by the contractors. They are on the pavement and are a potential hazard for pedestrians. They have been there for two weeks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 131, Bladindon Drive, Blendon, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree unstable outside 45 Little Birches, Sidcup, 8th October
item.description:
Tree is unstable outside 45 Little Birches, Sidcup postcode DA15 7LN. Since storm Amy at the weekend the tree is unstable and needs looking at. The roots are coming out of the ground on the pavement making the pavement dangerous at night or for people with bad eye sight. It is outside my property and am worries it will fall on my house or vehicles.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 49, Little Birches, Longlands, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pile of recycling bags and a pile of black bags., 8th October
item.description:
